version_description:
Note: With this update you will keep the fingerprint login and your contacts. We apologise for any inconvenience.

Thanks for your feedback. We have already included the top user feedback into version 1.2:
- IBAN and transaction data can now be copied to transfer money more comfortably or to define new contacts for "transferring money to friends"
- Transfer confirmations can be shared in other applications
- Home saving products are not automatically added to the overall balance
- Fix in case user wants to save an account number in combination with FingerprintLogin
- Fix for credit card transactions in foreign currencies
- Further minor background enhancements

Note: With this update you will keep the fingerprint login and your contacts. We apologise for any inconvenience.

- Fix for credit card transactions in foreign currencies
- Further minor background enhancements

Thanks for your feedback. We have already included the top user feedback into version 1.2:

New features in version 1.3
In the update to version 1.3, we have taken into account your feedback and extended the capabilities of Deutsche Bank Mobile again. Thanks for your feedback. That is new:

Transfers:
Now you can do transfers with Deutsche Bank Mobile throughout the SEPA area, create new contacts from transaction data, create scheduled transfers or enter your own reference in transfers to friends.

Investment:
Compare your portfolio with a value of 25,000.- Euro plus with the orientation portfolio of Deutsche Bank investment strategists. Also new: The display of the depot overview grouped by asset classes.

3DTouch / ForcedTouch (from iPhone 6s):
Firmer pressure on the app icon (from iPhone 6s) takes you directly to SEPA credit transfer or c directly to contact creation from a transaction. If you press slightly firmer on a transaction the detail view opens.

German Bank Mobile is continually evolving. The next update with new features will be released in late August.

New features in version 1.4
In the update to version 1.4, we have taken your feedback into account and extended the features of Deutsche Bank Mobile again. Thanks for your feedback.

That is new:

Transfer templates, sub accounts and standing orders:
Deutsche Bank Mobile allows to use transfer templates from your online banking now. Additionally, you can simply make transactions to your sub accounts or check your standing orders.

The Deutsche Bank financial planner:
If you have the Deutsche Bank financial planner enabled in your online banking, you can see your categorized expenses in the app.

Deutsche Bank Mobile is continually evolving. The next update will be released soon.

New features in version 1.5
In the update to version 1.5, we have taken your feedback into account and extended the features of Deutsche Bank Mobile again. Thanks for your feedback.

That is new:

Standing orders:
You are able to set up, change or delete standing orders in the app now.

The Deutsche Bank financial planner:
You can now see your categorized incomes as well as expenses from your financial planner which you can filter by time period.

Account balances:
You are now not only able to scroll through your account balances in the transaction graph, but also can select the desired time period.

Full-text search:
Using the new full-text search, you can easily search your transactions for single incomes or expenses now.

Deutsche Bank Mobile is continually evolving. The next update will be released soon.

New features in version 1.5.1

In the update to version 1.5.1, we have taken your feedback into account and extended the features of Deutsche Bank Mobile again. Thanks for your feedback.

That is new:

Multibanking 
You can add accounts, cards and securities account from foreign banks to your financial overview to have an entire overview about your financials.

The Deutsche Bank financial planner:
You can now see your categorized incomes as well as expenses from your financial planner which you can filter by time period.

Account balances
You are now not only able to scroll through your account balances in the transaction graph, but also can select the desired time period.

Full-text search
Using the new full-text search, you can easily search your transactions for single incomes or expenses now.

Minor enhancements
Issues during saving of local contacts are removed

Deutsche Bank Mobile is continually evolving. The next update will be released soon.

New features in version 1.6.1:

Multibanking
You are now able to directly activate the multi-banking functionality in the app. You can add accounts, cards and securities accounts from foreign banks to your financial overview to have an entire overview about your financials.

Minor enhancements
Harmonization of design as well as error reduction and stability enhancements.

The next update will be released soon.

Initiate transfers with Siri
Photograph your invoices and transfer money
Access to your Postbox
Display of historic credit card transactions
PIN saving and auto synchronization for Multibanking

Transfer money with Siri
Transfers to friends can now be initiated via Siri (e.g. „Hey Siri, transfer five Euros to Tim using DB Mobile“) and simply have to be confirmed with a TAN.

SmartTransfer
The SmartTransfer allows you to easily capture invoices and transfer slips with your camera - the relevant data is immediately recognized and transferred to the transfer mask.

Digital Postbox
Have all your account, security and credit card statements at hand.

Credit card transactions and limit
Already billed periods for credit card transactions as well as the limit for the current month are displayed in the app now.

Multibanking
You are now able to save the PIN for added institutes, furthermore transactions will be synchronized automatically after login.

The next update will be released soon.

eSafe - your digital password and document safe
Optimized design
Buxfixes and further enhancements

Deutsche Bank eSafe
After successful registration in Online Banking, your are able to use your eSafe within the app and manage your documents and passwords on the go.

The next update will be released soon.

- Request an overdraft with a realtime decision
- Access your new, improved Postbox
- Bug fixes

Apple Pay is here!
You are now able to use your iPhone or Apple Watch to pay worldwide, the activation of Apple Pay can be directly done in the app.
Use your existing Mastercard or directly request a new virtual card for free within our app.
Additionally we included the overall view on income/expenses in the Financial Planner.
